actions.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 239 (Roll no. 195).

description: Amendment sought to require a study and report submitted to Congress determining the successful aspects of HAMP, and legislative recommendations for a replacement loan modification program.
purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 112-34 to require a study and report submitted to Congress determining the successful aspects of HAMP, and legislative recommendations for a replacement loan modification program.
